Articles.title: First Post
Articles.author: Christopher Bell
Articles.text: So, I'm working on this angular app to show all my blog post from this json file. If you see this then, it's working.

Articles.title: Site Updates
Articles.author: Christopher Bell
Articles.text:
So I consider the new blog as a major upgrade to the site. Anyone who has visited before knows the vastness of this barren wasteland in terms of content. 
 I plan on making many more major upgrades to the site. It's mostly a matter of when the planning phases of these projects will be complete that will determine when I'll work on these updates; however, you all can expect to see something new before the end of the year.

Articles.title: Advice Wanted!
Articles.author: Christopher Bell
Articles.text:
Hi All!
 Sorry for the lack of updates. I've been a bit busy. I do have something to announce and that is the acceptance of suggestions for the site! If you have any suggestions please open an issue on the github page!
 www.github.com/Azurras/Azurras/issues

Articles.title: Nav and Footer Upgrades
Articles.author: Christopher Bell
Articles.text:
I've updated the header and footer of the site to use angular templates to remove any instances of me having to change anything in the nav or footer on multiple pages. You may notice a slow down in inital load times because of this. I have a few ideas for a fix and will probably have something out soon. If you want to take a crack at it you can find the issue at the link below.
 https://github.com/Azurras/Azurras/issues/11
